text: John Forslund (born February 14, 1962) is an American television presenter and announcer. He is the television play-by-play announcer for the Carolina Hurricanes. He has been with the team since 1991 (when the team was the Hartford Whalers) and has been calling games since 1995. Forslund was born in Springfield, Massachusetts. On March 13, 2020, Forslund tested positive to COVID-19., abc11.com, 2029 March 13 ==References== Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:American television presenters Category:Sportspeople from Massachusetts Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts
title: John Forslund
